name: Gravitating Together
description:
Gravitating Together is a platformer/puzzle game where you control one planet at a time and the other ones gets gravitated towards you. Try to get both of them to the end of the stage to continue. It was made for the 2021 GMTK game jam.

Controls:

  • A to go left and D to go right
  • W/Space to jump
  • E to swap
  • Shift to sprint

Note:

The sound effects don't work in the WebGL version.
